summary: A group of people brought together through a twist of fate hide out in a remote cabin, unaware that a ferocious monster roams the surrounding area.
cast: Danielle Donahue|Jeff Kirkendall|Bob Dennis|James Carolus|Steve Diasparra|Ken Van Sant|Todd Carpenter|Kelsey Kaufmann|Austin Dragovich|Laurie Smith|Richard Rawson|Frank Humes|Houston Baker|Mark Polonia
title: Jurassic Prey
